Columbus, Ohio
Dear Dick:
In respect to your letter of August 20 about the
Educational Media Council, I suggest that we retain the
status quo as regards NAEB representation. Letâ€™s keep
Hull and Harley as the official representatives, with Hill
as the backup man. With this arrangement. Hill can attend

So far as the October session is concerned, we will
just assume that you will not be able to make it and
have Harold attend in your place,
Cordially yours,
